# This file is autogenerated
title: createAccount
description: Overview of the createAccount method
slug: wallets/reference/account-kit/signer/classes/ServerSignerClient/createAccount
---

Creates a new user with the given parameters.

## Import

```ts
import { ServerSignerClient } from "@account-kit/signer";
```

## Parameters

### params

`CreateAccountParams`
The parameters for creating the account

### params.type

`string`
The type of account to create (only "apiKey" is supported)

### params.publicKey

`string`
The public key to use to authenticate on behalf of the user

### params.email

`string`
The email address associated with the user (optional)

## Returns

`Promise<SignupResponse>`
A promise that resolves to the signup response
